extendedInfo.description: In His Steps is the daily Scripture reflection journal of Couples for Christ â Global Mission Foundation, Inc.  It aims to faithfully guide its readers in developing a deeper relationship with God and, as a result thereof, fostering a transforming love for others.  Found in its pages are the personal insights and experiences of members of CFC and its different ministries, mainly Handmaids of the Lord, Singles for Christ, and Youth for Christ. Members of the clergy who are familiar with the work of CFC have also contributed reflections to this volume.FEATURES:- Daily Scripture reading from April 1 - June 30, 2013- Daily reflections and guide questions for personal reflection- Current reading will be shown based on the current date- Calendar feature to jump to a specific day- Now supported on all device sizes (text size setting now added)PLUS ADDITIONAL FEATURES:- Essential Catholic Prayers- Novenas- Monthly Prayer Intentions- Bible in 1 year
